name: Facebook Demographics
description: Understand the users visiting your page, and identify audience segments that your content resonates with most. Originates from the Gallery.

facebook.name: Facebook Fans Demographics
facebook.description: Aggregated demographic data about the people who like your Page based on the age and gender information they provide in their user profiles. Originates from the Gallery.
